title: Introduction to Statistics

Scale of Measurement
Describes nature of information within the values.

Nominal: Name of Insignificant number, e.g., color, Street no.,
Ordinal: Order matters, e.g., rating
Interval: Zero may not be zero, like temperature, IQ
Ratio: Zero is 0; most variables fall in this category

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Shifting origin and scale
Say we have values, \(x_1, x_2, \cdot \cdot \cdot , x_n\)

Origin shift: Adding/Subtracting
\(y_1 = x_1-a \space or \space x_1+a\)
Scale shift: Multiplying/Division
\(y_1 = b \cdot x_1  \space or \space x_1/b\)
both: \(y_i = \frac{x_i-a}{b}\)
Why might we need it?

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Theorem 01: \(\Sigma bx_i\)
\[\sum_{i=1}^n bx_i=b \sum_{i=1}^n x_i\]

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Theorem 02: \(\Sigma (ax_i-b)\)
\[\sum_{i=1}^n (ax_i-b)=a \sum_{i=1}^n x_i-nb\]

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Quick tips

\(\sum_{i=1}^n a = na\)
Can you prove it?

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Theorem 03: \(\Sigma (ax_i^2-bx_i+c\)
\[\sum_{i=1}^n (ax_i^2-bx_i+c)=a\sum_{i=1}^n x_i^2-b\sum_{i=1}^n x_i + nc\]

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Theorem 04: \(\Sigma (ax_i-by_i)\)
\[\sum_{i=1}^n (ax_i-by_i)=a\sum_{i=1}^n x_i - b \sum_{i=1}^n y_i\]

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Theorem 05: \(\Sigma (ax_i-b)^2\)
\[\sum_{i=1}^n (ax_i-b)^2=a^2 \sum_{i=1}^n x_i^2 - 2ab \sum_{i=1}^n x_i + nb^2\]

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Theorem 06: \((\sum_{i=1}^n x_i)^2\)
\[(\sum_{i=1}^n x_i)^2=\sum_{i=1}^n x_i^2 + \sum_{i \ne j}^n\sum x_ix_j\]

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Quick Tip
\[\prod_{i=1}^k x_i = x_1 \times x_2 \times \cdot \cdot \cdot \times x_n\]

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Theorem 07: \(\prod_{i=1}^k x_iy_i\)
\[\prod_{i=1}^k x_iy_i = (\prod_{i=1}^k x_i)(\prod_{i=1}^k y_i)\]

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Theorem 08: \(\Sigma \Sigma (x_i+y_j)\)

\(\displaystyle  \sum_{i=1}^m \sum_{j=1}^n (x_i+y_j)=n\sum_{i=1}^m x_i + m \sum_{i=1}^n y_j\)

\(\displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^m (x_i+y_1+x_i+y_2+\cdots+x_i+y_n)\)
\(\displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^m \{(x_i+x_i+\cdots \text{up to n})+(y_1+y_2+\cdots+y_n)\)
\(\displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^m(nx_i+\sum_{j=1}^ny_j)\)
\(\displaystyle (nx_1+\sum_{j=1}^ny_j+nx_2+ \sum_{j=1}^ny_j)+\cdots+nx_m+\sum_{j=1}^ny_j))\)
\(\displaystyle n\sum_{i=1}^m x_i+m\sum_{j=1}^ny_j\)

title: Introduction to Statistics
text:
Theorem: \(\Sigma \Sigma x_iy_j\)
\(\displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^m \sum_{i=1}^n x_iy_j=(\sum_{i=1}^n x_i) (\sum_{i=1}^n y_j)\)

\(\displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^m (x_iy_1+x_iy_2+\cdots+x_iy_n)\)
\(\displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^m x_i(y_1+y_2+\cdots+y_n)\)
\(\displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^m x_i \sum_{i=1}^n y_i\)

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 1. Allah has made the earth a bed
text:
1. Allah has made the earth a bed

2:22 لَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ فِرَاشًا وَالسَّمَاءَ بِنَاءً - It is He who made for you the earth a bed [spread out] and the sky a canopy and sent down from the sky rain and brought forth thereby fruits as provision for you. So do not attribute to Allah equals while you know [that there is nothing similar to Him].
20:53 الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ مَهْدًا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًا - [It is He] who has made for you the earth as a bed and inserted therein for you roadways and sent down from the sky, rain and produced thereby categories of various plants.
43:10 الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ مَهْدًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ - [He] who made for you the earth a bed and made for you upon it roads that you might be guided.
51:48 وَالْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَاهَا فَنِعْمَ الْمَاهِدُونَ - And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.
71:19 وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا - And Allah has made the earth for you as a carpet.
78:6 أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا - Have We not made the earth a resting place?
2. Earth Spread Out
13:3وَهُوَ الَّذِي مَدَّ الْأَرْضَ وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَأَنْهَارًا ۖ – And it is He who spread the earth and placed therein firmly set mountains and rivers…
15:19وَالْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَاهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ – And the earth We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains…
67:24 – Say, “It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.”
91:6 – And [by] the earth and He who spread it.
50:7 – And the earth – We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains…
51:48 – And the earth – We have spread it, and excellent is the preparer.
88:20 – And at the earth – how it is spread out?

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 1. The Hour Weighs Heavy on the Heavens and the Earth
text:
1. The Hour Weighs Heavy on the Heavens and the Earth

7:187هُوَ ۚ ثَقُلَتْ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ – They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival? Say, “Its knowledge is only with my Lord. None will reveal its time except Him. It lays heavily upon the heavens and the earth. It will not come upon you except unexpectedly.” They ask you as if you are familiar with it. Say, “Its knowledge is only with Allah, but most of the people do not know.”

4. Earth Made Spacious
اللَّهُ الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ قَرَارًا وَالسَّمَاءَ بِنَاءً وَصَوَّرَكُمْ فَأَحْسَنَ صُوَرَكُمْ وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ الطَّيِّبَاتِ - 40:64 – It is Allah who made for you the earth a place of settlement and the sky a canopy and formed you and perfected your forms and provided you with good things. That is Allah, your Lord; then blessed is Allah, Lord of the worlds.

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 15. Reducing the Land from Its Borders
text:
15. Reducing the Land from Its Borders
أَفَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَنَّا نَقْلِصُ الْأَرْضَ مِنْ أَطْرَافِهَا

13:41 – Have they not seen that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? And Allah decides; there is no adjuster of His decision. And He is swift in account. :contentReferenceoaicite:3
21:44 – But, [on the contrary], We have provided good things for these [disbelievers] and their fathers until life was prolonged for them. Then do they not see that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? So it is they who will overcome? :contentReferenceoaicite:4

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 16. Will the Earth Swallow the Plotters?
text:
16. Will the Earth Swallow the Plotters?
أَفَمَنْ يَمْكُرُ بِسُوءَ فِعْلِهِ آمِنٌ أَنَّ اللَّهَ سَيَخْسِفُ بِهِمُ الْأَرْضَ؟

16:45 – Then, do those who have planned evil deeds feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them or that the punishment will not come upon them from where they do not perceive? :contentReferenceoaicite:5

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 17. Man Cannot Pierce the Earth or Reach the Mountains’ Height
text:
17. Man Cannot Pierce the Earth or Reach the Mountains’ Height
إِنَّكَ لَن تَخْرِقَ الْأَرْضَ وَلَن تَبْلُغَ الْجِبَالَ طُولًا

17:37 – And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, you will never tear the earth [apart], and you will never reach the mountains in height. :contentReferenceoaicite:6

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 18. What Is on Earth and the Ships Are Subject to You
text:
18. What Is on Earth and the Ships Are Subject to You
أَلَمْ تَرَوْا أَنَّ اللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ

22:65 – Do you not see that Allah has subjected to you whatever is on the earth and the ships which run through the sea by His command? And He restrains the sky from falling upon the earth, unless by His permission. Indeed Allah, to the people, is Kind and Merciful. :contentReferenceoaicite:7

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 19. The Earth Made Stable, Rivers, Mountains, Barrier Between Two Seas
text:
19. The Earth Made Stable, Rivers, Mountains, Barrier Between Two Seas
أَإِلَهٌ مَعَ اللَّهِ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

27:61 – Is He [not best] who made the earth a stable ground and placed within it rivers and made for it firmly set mountains and placed between the two seas a barrier? Is there a deity with Allah? [No], but most of them do not know. :contentReferenceoaicite:8

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 20. Travel the Land and Observe How He Began Creation
text:
20. Travel the Land and Observe How He Began Creation
سَبِّحِ اسْتَكْشِفْ أَرْضَكَ كَيْفَ بَدَأَ الْخَلْقَ

29:20 – Say, [O Muhammad], “Travel through the land and observe how He began creation. Then Allah will produce the final creation. Indeed Allah, over all things, is competent.” :contentReferenceoaicite:9

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 21. He Knows What Penetrates into the Earth and What Emerges
text:
21. He Knows What Penetrates into the Earth and What Emerges
يَعْلَمُ مَا يَخْرُجُ مِنَ الْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَدْخُلُ فِيهَا

34:2 – He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein. And He is the Merciful, the Forgiving. :contentReferenceoaicite:10

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 22. Have They Not Considered the Heavens and the Earth Before and Behind Them?
text:
22. Have They Not Considered the Heavens and the Earth Before and Behind Them?
أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُم مِّنَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ

34:9 – Then have they not considered what is before them and what is behind them of the heaven and earth? If We should will, We could cause the earth to swallow them or [could] let fall upon them fragments from the sky. Indeed in that is a sign for every servant turning back [to Allah]. :contentReferenceoaicite:11

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 23. Allah Holds the Heavens and the Earth (lest they cease)
text:
23. Allah Holds the Heavens and the Earth (lest they cease)
إِنَّ اللَّهَ مُمِسُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ أَن تَزُولَا

35:41 – Indeed, Allah holds the heavens and the earth, lest they cease. And if they should cease, no one could hold them [in place] after Him. Indeed, He is Forbearing and Forgiving. :contentReferenceoaicite:12

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 24. Lord of the Heavens and the Earth and What Is Between Them
text:
24. Lord of the Heavens and the Earth and What Is Between Them
رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا

37:5 – [He is] Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them and Lord of the sunrises. :contentReferenceoaicite:13

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 26. He Created the Heavens and the Earth in Six Days
text:
26. He Created the Heavens and the Earth in Six Days
إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ

50:38 – And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness. :contentReferenceoaicite:15

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 27. Seven Heavens and the Like of Them on Earth
text:
27. Seven Heavens and the Like of Them on Earth
هُوَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ وَمِنَ الْأَرْضِ مِثْلَهُنَّ

65:12 – It is Allah who has created seven heavens and of the earth, the like of them. [His] command descends among them so you may know that Allah is over all things competent and that Allah has encompassed all things in knowledge. :contentReferenceoaicite:16

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 28. Do You Feel Secure That He in the Heavens Would Not Cause the Earth to Swallow You?
text:
28. Do You Feel Secure That He in the Heavens Would Not Cause the Earth to Swallow You?
أَأَمِنْتُمْ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمْ مَّن فِي السَّمَاءِ أَوْ يَرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا

67:16 – Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway? :contentReferenceoaicite:17

title: The Quranic Verses on Earth
section: 29. Then We Broke Open the Earth, Splitting (with Sprouts)

29. Then We Broke Open the Earth, Splitting (with Sprouts)
ثُمَّ دَقَّقْنَا الْأَرْضَ فَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا نَبَاتَهَا

80:26 – Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts], and caused to grow within it grain and grapes and herbage. :contentReferenceoaicite:18
